examples.example: 我经常打电话给远方的家人，和他们分享我的快乐生活。

translate.english: I often call my family in the distance and share my happy life with them.

examples.example: 我一有空就会打电话给好朋友，聊聊我们的生活趣事。

translate.english: Whenever I'm free, I will call my good friends and chat about the interesting things in our lives.

examples.example: 我一遇到开心的事情就会打电话给朋友，向他们传递这份喜悦。

translate.english: Whenever I encounter something happy, I will call my friends and convey this joy to them.
